pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Categorisation of Continuous Variables in Prediction Models // Allows the user to categorise a continuous predictor variable in a logistic or a Cox proportional hazards regression setting, by maximising the discriminative ability of the model. I Barrio, I Arostegui, MX Rodriguez-Alvarez, JM Quintana (2015) doi:10.1177/0962280215601873. I Barrio, MX Rodriguez-Alvarez, L Meira-Machado, C Esteban, I Arostegui (2017) https://www.idescat.cat/sort/sort411/41.1.3.barrio-etal.pdf.
